name: h3
description: The 2026 Easton Hype Fire Drop 8 USA Baseball Bat is a game-changer for both contact and power hitters, boasting a balanced swing feel and a vibrant green, yellow, and pink colorway. This bat is USA Baseball Certified and features an innovative two-piece composite design with a 2 5/8 inch barrel diameter. Its 3D Ropecoil Composite technology wraps the barrel's sweet spot 360°, enhancing performance across the entire barrel. The Connexion Max elastomer connector minimizes vibration, delivering an optimal feel, while the Opti-Flex Handle and Flow Tack grip with a Power Boost Soft knob ensure superior comfort and control for elite travel ball athletes. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
category_path: 2026 Easton Hype Fire Drop 10 USA Baseball Bat: EUS6HYP10
